result.markdown: --- title: "Tidyverse" author: "Sucheth Shenoy" --- # Load Libraries ::: {.cell hash='01_tidyverse_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-1_fd461cef234b10d77e9e40a8b21c5449'} ```{.r .cell-code} library("tidyverse") ``` ::: # Importing Files ::: {.cell hash='01_tidyverse_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-2_1b5cb190729e13645e381981beb6afe8'} ```{.r .cell-code} bikes_tbl <- read_excel(path = "tidyverse_files/01_bike_sales/01_raw_data/bikes.xlsx") bikeshops_tbl <- read_excel("tidyverse_files/01_bike_sales/01_raw_data/bikeshops.xlsx") orderlines_tbl <- read_excel("tidyverse_files/01_bike_sales/01_raw_data/orderlines.xlsx") ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` #> New names: #> • `` -> `...1` ``` ::: ::: # Joining Data ::: {.cell hash='01_tidyverse_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-3_f89a769f25f3c223e517637efcb32ba0'} ```{.r .cell-code} bike_orderlines_joined_tbl <- orderlines_tbl %>% left_join(bikes_tbl, by = c("product.id" = "bike.id")) %>% left_join(bikeshops_tbl, by = c("customer.id" = "bikeshop.id")) ``` ::: # Wrangling Data ::: {.cell hash='01_tidyverse_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-4_900f7871185de907690bd45634a7c880'} ```{.r .cell-code} bike_orderlines_wrangled_tbl <- bike_orderlines_joined_tbl %>% separate(col = location, into = c("city", "state"), sep = ", ") %>% mutate(total.price = price * quantity) %>% rename(bikeshop = name) %>% set_names(names(.) %>% str_replace_all("\\.", "_")) ``` ::: # Business Insights ## Sales by location (state) ::: {.cell hash='01_tidyverse_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-5_356d4f9078ff8d1e3813b85663a8e26b'} ```{.r .cell-code} sales_by_location_tbl <- bike_orderlines_wrangled_tbl %>% select(state, total_price) %>% group_by(state) %>% summarize(sales = sum(total_price)) %>% mutate(sales_text = scales::dollar(sales, big.mark = ".", decimal.mark = ",", prefix = "", suffix = " €")) ``` ::: ::: {.cell hash='01_tidyverse_cache/html/plot1_d2ddcc1213c3da1ada4ae6b2c01df92e'} ```{.r .cell-code} sales_by_location_tbl %>% ggplot(aes(x = state, y = sales)) + geom_col(fill = "#2DC6D6") + # Use geom_col for a bar plot geom_label(aes(label = sales_text)) + # Adding labels to the bars geom_smooth(method = "lm", se = FALSE) + # Adding a trendline theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1)) + scale_y_continuous(labels = scales::dollar_format(big.mark = ".", decimal.mark = ",", prefix = "", suffix = " €")) + labs( title = "Revenue by location (state)", x = "", # Override defaults for x and y y = "Revenue" ) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` #> `geom_smooth()` using formula = 'y ~ x' ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](01_tidyverse_files/figure-html/plot1-1.png){width=960} ::: ::: ## Sales by location (state) and year ::: {.cell hash='01_tidyverse_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-6_7b0ea164e786ef51986778a792df1b4e'} ```{.r .cell-code} sales_by_year_location_tbl <- bike_orderlines_wrangled_tbl %>% select(order_date, total_price, state) %>% mutate(year = year(order_date)) %>% group_by(year, state) %>% summarise(sales = sum(total_price)) %>% ungroup() %>% mutate(sales_text = scales::dollar(sales, big.mark = ".", decimal.mark = ",", prefix = "", suffix = " €")) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` #> `summarise()` has grouped output by 'year'. You can override using the #> `.groups` argument. ``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell hash='01_tidyverse_cache/html/plot2_e888d0e80bcfec83f445168be366a659'} ```{.r .cell-code} sales_by_year_location_tbl %>% ggplot(aes(x = year, y = sales, fill = state)) + geom_col() + # Run up to here to get a stacked bar plot facet_wrap(~ state) + theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1)) + scale_y_continuous(labels = scales::dollar_format(big.mark = ".", decimal.mark = ",", prefix = "", suffix = " €")) + labs( title = "Revenue by year and location (state)", y = "Revenue", fill = "Location" # Changes the legend name, ) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](01_tidyverse_files/figure-html/plot2-1.png){width=960} ::: :::
